title: Get Invaders game for your smartphone now from Mirror Games
text:
Known as the daddy of all video games, Invaders was what set the video games industry on its way.
It was light years ahead of others, a real ground breaker.
Did you know it was originally intended as a breakout game, or that its music was cutting edge?
Seems incredible now, but this game really is where it all began.
Click here to download
This is your chance to play a version of this classic, in its original format, so it plays just like the game did all those years ago.
Of course, we’ve put the Mirror Games spin on it and included all the bells and whistles for you to play on your smartphone.
Don’t forget to upload your scores to your Facebook page and share with your friends.
Here are some simple instructions to help you get started:
Move left and right, miss the incoming missiles
Press shoot to kill the aliens
Look out for the bonus spacecraft flying across the top of the screen.
This game is free and currently only available on Android, but don’t worry you iPhone users, a version for you will be along very soon.
Check back to Mirror Games over the coming weeks for all sorts of different games for you to enjoy.
From retro remakes to new games, and more, we’ll be bringing you the lot.
